Uses of Interface
com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout.LayoutManager

  • Packages that use LayoutManager 
    Package Description
    com.github.bordertech.wcomponents
    Contains the core components of the WComponent framework.
    com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout
    Provides classes which are used to visually arrange components in a UI.

    • Uses of LayoutManager in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents

      Methods in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents that return LayoutManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LayoutManager WPanel.getLayout() 
      Methods in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents with parameters of type LayoutManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void WPanel.setLayout(LayoutManager layout)
      Sets the panel layout manager.

    • Uses of LayoutManager in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout

      Classes in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout that implement LayoutManager 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BorderLayout
      Deprecated. 
      WComponents 1.1.4. Use WRow and WColumn or ColumnLayout instead. It is preferred that an application use WTemplate for layout as this provides for lighter payloads and more responsive UIs.
      class  ColumnLayout
      ColumnLayout renders its items in columns.
      class  FlowLayout
      FlowLayout is a LayoutManager that allows components to be added to a WPanel in an arrangement that allows for vertical or horizontal flows irrespective of the content type of the added component.
      class  GridLayout
      GridLayout is a LayoutManager that emulates GridLayout.
      class  ListLayout
      ListLayout renders out its items in a list.
